original_text: Then they came to Gilead, and to Kadesh in the land of the Hittites; and they came to Dan, and from Dan they went around to Sidon,
korean_text: 길르앗에 이르고 닷딤홋시 땅에 이르고 또 다냐안에 이르러서는 시돈으로 돌아

sentences.original_text: and to Kadesh in the land of the Hittites
and from Dan they went around to Sidon
